Venger: Neću odbiti pregovore s Bajernom
"Još nisam odlučio hoću li se vratiti trenerskom poslu ili ne. Nedostaje mi teren, tako da je teška odluka preda mnom. Ali doneću je u narednih nekoliko dana"...

07 Nov 2019

Bild je sinoć doneo informaciju da je Bajern odabrao Arsena Vengera za trenera do kraja tekuće sezone, odnosno da će ugovor biti potpisan u narednih nekoliko dana, ali francuski stručnjak je ipak "stao na loptu" i poručio da zvaničnih kontakata sa upravom Bavaraca nije bilo. Još..."Nikada ne bih odbio da pregovaram sa Bajernom jer poznajem ljude koji vode klub skoro 30 godina", poručio je iskusni stručnjak koji je bez posla od odlaska iz Arsenala.
"Nekada davno bio sam blizu dolaska u Minhen, to je sve što mogu da kažem. Trenutno ne vodimo nikakve razgovore i ne znam hoćemo li". 
Venger ima otvorenu ponudu za posao iz Fife, ali još nije odlučio da li želi definitivno da napusti trenerski posao. Očito da mu interesovanje Nemaca prija. Nezvanično, Francuz trenutno pokušava da izboksuje realnu klauzulu u ugovoru (ukoliko ostvari zacrtani rezultat) po kojoj bi sporazum bio automatski produžen nakon juna, jer Bajern mu nudi posao do kraja sezone, kada bi navodno krenuo po mlađeg trenera.
Prema Bildu, ti detalji trebalo bi da se iskristališu do subote, kada se očekuje Vengerov dolazak u Nemačku..."Još nisam odlučio hoću li se vratiti trenerskom poslu ili ne. Nedostaje mi teren, tako da je teška odluka preda mnom. Ali doneću je u narednih nekoliko dana", zaključio je 70-godišnji strateg.

Foto: Reuters

Wenger: I will not refuse negotiations with Bayern
"I have not yet decided whether to return to the coaching job or not. I miss the pitch, so it is a difficult decision before me. But I will make it in the next few days" ...

07 Nov 2019

Bild reported last night that Bayern had selected Arsene Wenger as coach by the end of the current season, that the contract would be signed in the next few days, but the French expert still "got on the ball" and said there were no official contacts with the Bavarians. Still ... "I would never refuse to negotiate with Bayern because I have known people who run the club for almost 30 years," said an experienced expert who has been out of work since leaving Arsenal.
"Once upon a time, I was close to coming to Munich, that's all I can say. We don't have any conversations right now and I don't know if we will."
Wenger has an open job offer from Fife, but has not yet decided if he wants to definitely leave the coaching job. Obviously, the Germans' interest appeals to him. Unofficially, the Frenchman is currently trying to forge a realistic clause in the contract (if it achieves the intended result) under which the agreement would be automatically extended beyond June, as Bayern offers him a job until the end of the season, when he is supposed to go for a younger coach.
According to Bild, those details should crystallize by Saturday, when Wenger's arrival in Germany is expected ... "I have not yet decided whether to return to the coaching job or not. I miss the pitch, so it is a difficult decision for me. But I will make is in the next few days, "the 70-year-old strategist concluded.
